description:
Fuerlu and his friend Gyakuran have come to the Screw-Ya for help. Fuerlu can`t stop hiccupping up VocaScrews! Nejiru and Heybot try to help him, but the problem just gets worse and worse. And soon Nejiru`s own motives begin to appear a bit suspect...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heybot Makes More with a Sneeze!
ヘックションでフエフエのヘボ
